title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not visible.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator tool.
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects.
3. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, while the Close Project option is not visible.
